name: HYPERGUN
description: Fight through waves of alien interlopers and save the world as Dewey Owens in HYPERGUN, a fast-paced roguelite shooter centering around a procedural weapon of questionable effectiveness. Enter the simulation. Build the HYPERGUN!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required) Processor: Intel Core i3-7350K (or AMD equivalent) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvida GeForce GT 8800 (or AMD equivalent) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Expect 30 FPS at 720p on "Low" settings with this configuration.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 (64-bit OS required) Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K (or AMD equivalent) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 (or AMD equivalent) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Expect 60 FPS at 1080p on "High" settings with this configuration.
